We went to Teresa Carles on several occasions for TAKE OUT.  They have the BEST juices.  I particularly like the "anti-ox" which is kiwi, lemon, strawberry, & one other thing.  Their "detox" beet/celery one is good too, especially after drinking a lot & eating lots o' meat.We went once for dinner too and it did not disappoint.  The gazpacho was particularly tasty - it had a hint of mint -  and so was the avocado/tofu starter.  Their salads are nice & huge, though I'd tell them to lay off the dressing a bit on the Caesar.  I like that you can make your own salad.  Presentation was also top-notch.All in all, TC is a great place to go for a break from all the meat tapas so you can get some salads & vegetables & fruits (I'm from the Bay Area where we live & die by fresh produce)!  Don't forget to get the juices!
